objects.css: background-image: linear-gradient(-45deg, #111 25%, black 25%, black 50%, #111 50%, #111 75%, black 75%, black);background-size: 50px 50px;background-repeat:repeat

info.name: Cities
info.attribution:
Room layout by ArnoldSmith86 and LawDawg96 released to public domain by CC0.

Game pieces by ArnoldSmith86 released to public domain by CC0.

The sprite sheet for the tiles was created by ArnoldSmith86 and LawDawg96, licensed as CC By 3.0, and contains the following artwork:

CC By 3.0 by Delapouite:

info.description: Tile-building game where players create and link farmland, cities, and roads to earn points. Optional 4 expansion packs with additional tiles, scoring system, and rules available and built-in to the main game.
